name: Road of legend: revolution
description:
The latest combat RPG game Road of Legend: Revolution is available to download now! The fancy world that you've never been. In which, you can fully experience the amazing combat and the intricate relations.

Features:
1. Grow up together with your favorite characters.
2. Fighters recruiting, arbitrary combination, form up your squad at will.
3. Fighters advancing, weapons strengthening, destroy your enemy!.
4. Exciting combats with strategies, to prove that you are the best of the bests.
Get involved in the unprecedented world; forge your own legend. Only in Road of Legend: Revolution!
